narrative.narrative: US-Bangla Airlines is based out of Dhaka,Bangladesh and does domestic flights. It serves 5 domestic airports from its hub. As of 2014 it does the Chittagong route four times a day. The Cox's Bazar and Jessore route once a day. The Sylhet one three times a week,and the same for Saidpur. It started operations in 2014. It has two Bombardier Dash 8-400's. Its name comes from the United States-Bangladesh joint venture company, known as the US-Bangla Group, who owns it.
